narrative.title: 21 Panzer Division - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: German Panzer Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored division optimized for combined-arms operations in desert warfare
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

supply.notes: Supply situation better than Q1 after Gazala offensive success but still constrained by Mediterranean shipping losses

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combined-arms coordination between tanks, motorized infantry, and artillery
Effective use of 88mm FlaK in anti-tank role
Experienced in desert warfare conditions (formed from 5. leichte Division)

supply_states.notes: Supply situation better than Q1 after Gazala offensive success but still constrained by Mediterranean shipping losses
